story:
OUR BOLD AUDACIOUS GOAL:
   To save the planet through shopping!

 Sound like a conflict of interest? Just the opposite! We are committed to increasing the demand for products that support:

  • Less waste
  • Renewable resources
  • Fair wages
  • Safe materials


THE CHALLENGE:

Americans love to shop (we know, we’re avid shoppers ourselves), but we're tired of the endless guilt associated with buying products from companies with no conscience. 

  

 

THE SOLUTION:

Good to Green makes it easy to shop green, and you’d be surprised by the companies that are going green. We do the research for you, so you don’t have to. We promote companies who are doing good work in the world (Ex: Reducing their carbon footprint, creating better workplace conditions, providing charitable donations, and more).

We select the companies on our site based on many 3rd party rating systems. Our primary guiding principle is to promote retail partners who support Triple Bottom Line business practices: People, Planet, Profit.

The Triple Bottom Line includes:

  • People
    • Good Benefits, Fair Wages, Safe working conditions, Healthy  products, and Community Participation
  • Planet
    • Waste Reduction, Recycling, Clean Energy, Efficient Buildings, Reduction of Toxics, Transportation Efficiency, Conservation
  • Profit
    • Create value, Maintain stability, Share prosperity, Pay Taxes, Invest in Change


Come to our site to learn more about our selection process (www.GoodtoGreen.com). We have an amazing lineup of pre-vetted companies and are adding new stores to our site everyday (so please be patient with us while we grow). :)

 

But doesn't shopping green cost more?!?

Cash back rewards for each and every purchase on our site!


One of the largest complaints we hear about green shopping, is it costs too much! We believe you get what you pay for, and have made it easier for you to go green by giving you green back for every purchase you initiate through our site (cash back rewards).

We reward good shopping behavior! 

Create an account to start earning cash back on environmental shopping today!

www.GoodtoGreen.com

We are building a market place that reflects the future we need to create for generations and generations to come. We know it’s possible, but we need your help to build continuous momentum.

 

THE CAMPAIGN:

  
 SAVE THE PLANET. SHOP SMART. 
              

    We are raising a minimum of $50,000.


Our $50k+ crowdfunds will be used to:

  • Enhance the shopping experience (Ex: Add new site features that will recommend products just for you based on your shopping preferences).
  • Build more partnerships with prominent retailers.
  • Increase our education and outreach - Expand the Good to Green membership to a national audience.

Funding us means taking part in the movement to create a better future.  We are building a community of folks who can easily make an impact in reducing the planet's carbon footprint, and contributing to social justice and conscious commerce. All of this - without major behavioral change. Just a little bit of education and a click on mouse to purchase the items you would normally purchase anyways. But with Good to Green, you can trust your purchase power is actually making a difference.

All of this - without a major change in human behavior. Just a little bit of education and a few click of the mouse to purchase items you normally purchase anyways.

But with Good to Green, you can trust your purchase is a powerful purchase - because it actually makes a difference by investing in the future of our planet (by making a statement in rewarding good manufacturing practices).

 

Our crowdfunds will be used wisely, we promise!
Most of us are volunteers!

 
 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A SAMPLE OF OUR PRIZES:

Below are just some of the rewards we have in store for you. Please review all donation options to the right.


Amy Johnson Original Painting

 


Amy Johnson Original Painting

 

Mark Sivertsen Original Painting



Mark Sivertsen Original Painting


Mark Sivertsen Original Painting

Mark Sivertsen Original Painting
 
Kelly Grace Field Original Painting
 
 
Good to Green T-Shirts
 
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE G2G TEAM

 
*We are growing so fast, we don't even have a current picture of all our team members! 


Our team is a group of super smart, passionate change agents including: Environmental Scientists, Avid Shoppers, Marketers, Business Gurus, etc.

Good to Green is a cooperative effort! We understand it's gonna take something special to grow this ambitious endeavor. We have recruited a core staff of 10 team members (most of whom are working for free) and have an additional 30+ enthusiastic folks supporting the growth of this mission, vision, and brand.

 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


YOUR IMPACT - WHAT'S POSSIBLE? 

 

#1 - YOUR DONATION

Funding us means taking part in the movement to create a better future. We are building a community of folks who can easily make an impact in reducing the planet's carbon footprint, and contributing to social justice and conscious commerce.

 

#2 - JOIN THE COMMUNITY


 

Join us and earn green for the environment. Shop from hundreds of your favorite merchants and start earning cash back. We are adding many new stores daily, so keep checking back for new content.

#3 - SPREAD THE WORD

  

  • Please make some noise about this campaign!
  • Follow us, Like us, Join hands and Hug a Tree with us!
  • Share with your friends > who will share with their friends > who will share with their friends............

Just IMAGINE the IMPACT your word could make.... 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

     That’s all there is to it. Thank you so much for your support!

 

********************************************

A genuine and heart-felt THANKS for your donation!
You are helping us expand the conversation of how
commerce will contirubte to the solution!

*********************************************

 YOU ROCK!!!
story_txt:
OUR BOLD AUDACIOUS GOAL:   To save the planet through shopping!
 Sound like a conflict of interest? Just the opposite! We are committed to increasing the demand for products that support:

Less waste
Renewable resources
Fair wages
Safe materials


THE CHALLENGE:
Americans love to shop (we know, we’re avid shoppers ourselves), but we're tired of the endless guilt associated with buying products from companies with no conscience. 
   
 
THE SOLUTION:
Good to Green makes it easy to shop green, and you’d be surprised by the companies that are going green. We do the research for you, so you don’t have to. We promote companies who are doing good work in the world (Ex: Reducing their carbon footprint, creating better workplace conditions, providing charitable donations, and more).
We select the companies on our site based on many 3rd party rating systems. Our primary guiding principle is to promote retail partners who support Triple Bottom Line business practices: People, Planet, Profit.

The Triple Bottom Line includes:

People

Good Benefits, Fair Wages, Safe working conditions, Healthy  products, and Community Participation


Planet

Waste Reduction, Recycling, Clean Energy, Efficient Buildings, Reduction of Toxics, Transportation Efficiency, Conservation


Profit

Create value, Maintain stability, Share prosperity, Pay Taxes, Invest in Change



Come to our site to learn more about our selection process (www.GoodtoGreen.com). We have an amazing lineup of pre-vetted companies and are adding new stores to our site everyday (so please be patient with us while we grow). :)
 
But doesn't shopping green cost more?!?

Cash back rewards for each and every purchase on our site!
One of the largest complaints we hear about green shopping, is it costs too much! We believe you get what you pay for, and have made it easier for you to go green by giving you green back for every purchase you initiate through our site (cash back rewards).
We reward good shopping behavior! 
Create an account to start earning cash back on environmental shopping today!www.GoodtoGreen.com
We are building a market place that reflects the future we need to create for generations and generations to come. We know it’s possible, but we need your help to build continuous momentum.
 
THE CAMPAIGN:
    SAVE THE PLANET. SHOP SMART.               

    We are raising a minimum of $50,000.

Our $50k+ crowdfunds will be used to:

Enhance the shopping experience (Ex: Add new site features that will recommend products just for you based on your shopping preferences).
Build more partnerships with prominent retailers.
Increase our education and outreach - Expand the Good to Green membership to a national audience.


Funding us means taking part in the movement to create a better future.  We are building a community of folks who can easily make an impact in reducing the planet's carbon footprint, and contributing to social justice and conscious commerce. All of this - without major behavioral change. Just a little bit of education and a click on mouse to purchase the items you would normally purchase anyways. But with Good to Green, you can trust your purchase power is actually making a difference.

All of this - without a major change in human behavior. Just a little bit of education and a few click of the mouse to purchase items you normally purchase anyways.
But with Good to Green, you can trust your purchase is a powerful purchase - because it actually makes a difference by investing in the future of our planet (by making a statement in rewarding good manufacturing practices).
 

Our crowdfunds will be used wisely, we promise! Most of us are volunteers!

 
 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A SAMPLE OF OUR PRIZES:
Below are just some of the rewards we have in store for you. Please review all donation options to the right.
Amy Johnson Original Painting
 
Amy Johnson Original Painting
 

Mark Sivertsen Original Painting



Mark Sivertsen Original Painting

Mark Sivertsen Original Painting



Mark Sivertsen Original Painting
 


Kelly Grace Field Original Painting
 
 

Good to Green T-Shirts
 
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE G2G TEAM
 *We are growing so fast, we don't even have a current picture of all our team members! 
Our team is a group of super smart, passionate change agents including: Environmental Scientists, Avid Shoppers, Marketers, Business Gurus, etc.
Good to Green is a cooperative effort! We understand it's gonna take something special to grow this ambitious endeavor. We have recruited a core staff of 10 team members (most of whom are working for free) and have an additional 30+ enthusiastic folks supporting the growth of this mission, vision, and brand.
 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

YOUR IMPACT - WHAT'S POSSIBLE? 
 
#1 - YOUR DONATION

Funding us means taking part in the movement to create a better future. We are building a community of folks who can easily make an impact in reducing the planet's carbon footprint, and contributing to social justice and conscious commerce.
 

#2 - JOIN THE COMMUNITY

 
Join us and earn green for the environment. Shop from hundreds of your favorite merchants and start earning cash back. We are adding many new stores daily, so keep checking back for new content.


#3 - SPREAD THE WORD

   


Please make some noise about this campaign!
Follow us, Like us, Join hands and Hug a Tree with us!
Share with your friends > who will share with their friends > who will share with their friends............

Just IMAGINE the IMPACT your word could make....  

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
     That’s all there is to it. Thank you so much for your support!

story:
LETS START WITH THIS EXCITING NEWS- REFER 7 PERSONS THAT FUNDS OUR PROJECT AND WE WILL GIVE YOU ONE SIMILAR PERK/GIFT...SEE MORE DETAILS BELOW.

Introduction-

My name is Stanislus "Rich-Man" Offokansi,i have being a Finance Professional for about 15years of which i have spent a considerable part of my career trading Fixed Income Securities (Bonds and Interest Rates employing outright and various spread trading strategies), Equities, Forex and Commodity Futures with various Banks, Hedge-Funds and Proprietary trading Houses across three continents. Along with two of my partners i embarked on a project in which i have been researching,developing and testing out our proprietary trading algorithm/software which upon completion of this project should be able to trade any financial instrument profitably without any human intervention. I am at the point where i need to finalize my research and create an extraordinary software (a super hybrid machine compared to what we have achieved so far and whats out there in the open market) which will do great justice trading financial instruments. I hold a Masters in Business Administration from Georgia State University and another Masters in International Management and Finance from the University of Paris in France.

Project Description-This Project is an off-shoot of a research me and my team have been carrying of for about 4years - the result of (the research) which we very strongly believe will create a very sophisticated Algorithm that will detect points of market reversals and allow its users to take advantage thereof to execute/take buy and sell positions that will ensure CONSISTENT profitability.In developing this product we are employing our proprietary indicators, the best modern technology which combines quantitative and other statistical techniques,High Probability Methodology used by the prime High Frequency Trading outfits, Banks and Hedge-Funds.At the early years of my trading career, i was thought the following important facts about trading (irrespective of the financial instrument/asset being traded), and these are some of the underlying fact or reasoning by which our software was invented-

1. There are two extremes in the market - FEAR AND GREED.
2. Every traded financial instrument be it Fixed Income securities, Equities,Forex or commodities constantly moves from overbought positions (point where buy pressure is exhausted) and oversold positions (point where sell pressure is exhausted), and vise-visa.
3. Understanding market direction is very vital part of "Tape Reading".
4. Always seek to let your profits run,cut your losses and be very selective in your trades.

Executing trades via Human discretion has its numerous merits but also has some enormous disadvantages too. A typical disadvantage is FEAR of executing a trade even when you have the best thought-out strategy, Fat-fingering,indiscipline arising from holding a losing position beyond your predetermined stop target.Buying at price-fills other that your projected/target price.....We can go on, and on and on.....This Algorithm  which will be the result of my many years of research work will address these issues named above and most importantly will execute trades perfectly and precisely based on the strategy imputed there-in by the user. It will use its artificial intelligence to carry out accurate "Tape Reading" in the direction a Trend  and also detect "noisy" or "choppy" market and avoid same.It will generate signals at the key-points of market reversal which will be highlighted by a directional signals.THE MOST IMPORTANT MERIT OF THIS ANTICIPATED PRODUCT IS THAT IT IS USER FRIENDLY ,ANYONE CAN EASILY SET IT UP AND HAVE IT TRADE FOR YOU BASED ON YOUR IMPUTED TRADE IDEA.WHEN WE MEAN ANYONE..WE REALLY MEAN ANYONE CAN USE IT,EVEN IF YOU HAVE ABSOLUTELY NO KNOWLEDGE ABOUT TRADING.You can set it up based on your ideological parameters and get it trading while you concentrate on your other business or your 9am-spm job.
Your generous Help towards funding the final phase of the research will help us finalize our work and create a one in a kind machine which will trade financial instruments in a most sophisticated (YET VERY SIMPLE AND EASY TO USE) manner that will guarantee consistent profitability. The final product will come out in two forms (The Indicator- which will create signals at the point where the market will show tendencies of reversal, the user will have to manually execute trade upon sighting the signals - and the "Robo-Trader" - this has the artificial intelligence to execute trades without human intervention.
It is also worthy to mention that during the mid stages/phases of our work, we made available to the public some early versions of the product.This was done for performance measurement- to determine the extent to which we are on track;if actual performance is in line with expected-. We were way overwhelmed by the reception users gave the software.Some other reasons why we made this available is as follows-

1. To gather external or public users opinion about the Algorithm/Software performance at its present state.This feedback we believe is vital in identifying where we were, where we are presently and how much work we still need to put in to get to where we should be in terms of modelling the final product.
2. To raise money via sales of the product.All money from sales was put back into the business to meeting expenses related to research,Traveling and office expense.
3. To identify key areas where the software required improvements and what levels of improvements are to be made.
4. Measure how receptive the general public is to the product at its present stage.

*************note that the funds we seek is to help complete our research and have the final product ready. Upon release of final product we do not intend commercializing same (though we are sure the indicator and Robo-Trader will sell for $thousands of dollars) but will surely have the indicator or Robo-trader or both depending on the size of your gift to you (our funding partners).

Testimonials-
This is what some folks said about using our yet to be completed product we released last year-
1. ""I came across perfecttradingsignals.com while i was searching for tools that will give me an edge in the market. I tried it and all i can say is it sure calls some very powerful trades and i will recommend the software to any who thinks about using a tool that will offer you second opinion when trading.""" Michael j.- Arizona.

2. ""I tried various versions of the perfecttradingsignals.com software for 30days and invested about $4000 in making purchase of the life time license. Due to my trading style i have more preference executing my trades manually and the perfecttradingsignals.com indicators have been extremely very helpful in helping me eliminate potential bad trades and identifying trends and also keeping me on the right side of the trend.I will sure try the final Algorithm whenever it is ready."" Larry .N- Minnesota.

3. ""Surely this is one of the greatest trading tools i have ever used. The Autotrader executes trades at an amazing speed.Keep up the good work."" Kingsley .M - London, United Kingdom.


What We Need

We seek your support to raise $150,000:00 or more WHICH WILL BE USED TO MEET EXPENSES RELATED TO FINALIZING OUR RESEARCH WORK AND HAVING THE PRODUCT FULL TESTED AND READY. The bulk of the money we are seeking here and from external/personal sources will be expended on fees to our in-house and external consultants (who are some of the best Whiz-Kid Algorithm developers) who we are comfortable with seeking their additional opinion input. Second opinion like this normally turn out to be a big light in the areas where we still experience challenges. Other expense includes, project related travel expense (we normally attend seminars where we meet and rob minds with some of the brightest minds in the industry),expense related to packaging and having the software ready for our future users and office maintenance expense.


Will this product be created??

we are 100% sure it will be accomplished.AND IT WILL BE PERFECT FOR BOTH DAY-TRADING AND SWING TRADING.


What you get???

We will offer gifts to all our supporters depending on how much they committed to the project.We shall offer any of the following below and more (see gift page)-

1. The indicator (which does not have the artificial intelligence to automatically execute trades) which will plot signals signifying points to take a trade.This will be made available to those who pledge $50 - $75

2. The "Robo-Trader" which has the artificial intelligence to generate signals and also execute trades. This machine can just do your trading for you while you go about your other important business or attend issues related to your 9am -5pm job. This will be made available to those who pledge $100 - $150

3. Both the Robo-Trader and Indicator will be available to those who pledge $220.

4. We shall also offer Renko bars for those who contribute $25.

5.For those who who give $2000,you will get all of the above plus a two weekends of basic coding training (1 hour each weekend only).

6. For those who's funding support cannot get them gifts, we will immortalize their names on a thank you page that shall be created on our website at the end of this funding drive. 

7. we also have referral bonus!!!!If you Refer 7 people you get a gift if their donations was enough to earn then a gift.You will get same equivalent of gift.For example if you refer 7 people and the donated $150 each,you will get the one Robo-Trader- equivalent to the amount and perk they made and got respectively.


********Though the idea of this project is to understudy how price pattern can be better viewed and how artificial intelligence can be employed to trade the market profitably. If the final product were to be commercialized we are very sure it will attract thousands of dollars as price tag.

We are very optimistic that with your support we will not only get fully funded but exceed our funding target. But where we fall short of our funding goal we have other external sources through which the short-fall could be made up. ALL FUNDS RAISED IRRESPECTIVE OF WHETHER THE FUNDING TARGET IS MET OR NOT WILL ALL GO TOWARDS FINALIZING OUR PROJECT AND ALL OF OUR SUPPORTERS WILL GET THEIR GIFTS BY SEPTEMBER 2014.

The Impact to our potential contributors and the world????

How is this project valuable to contributors and the world? We are very optimistic that this research and the final product that shall be released will enhance or provide a dipper insight on how price action will be look at and will in turn provide our future users better judgement relating to when to buy,hold or sell when trading. Also it will help you identify easily when the market is choppy or noisy and in such cases prompting you to stay away.

There are over 100million people world-wide who desire to become financially independent via the opportunities the financial markets offer BUT CANNOT HARNESS SUCH OPPORTUNITY  DUE TO THE FACT THAT THEY ARE COMMITTED TO SOME FULL-TIME JOB OR OTHER PERSONAL BUSINESS; For this group of people the  "Robo-Trader" will certainly come in handy to help execute the buy and sell trades while they go about their normal business. Also as earlier mentioned above, planning a game winning strategy is one thing and being able to execute same effectively is a different ball game. Reasons for such inabilities are endless (bad order fills, fear, fat-fingering etc), the Robo-Trader will help eliminate considerably such inabilities.Finally to us the developers, completing this project will create an extraordinary software that will trade the financial market profitable via accurately following price action while also having the ability to eliminate a considerable amount of potential bad or loosing trades.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you might not be able to contribute, but that does not mean YOU CANNOT HELP.

  • You can help by helping us get the word (about this project) out there to the world around you and most especially the members of your network within and outside this platform.PLEASE HELP US MAKE SOME LOUD NOISE ABOUT THIS CAMPAIGN.
  • Please,Please,Please this is a great platform,help us to use the tools here to share the information about our project and invite your friends and members of your networks to support us.
  • Thanks you all and Godbless us all.Amen!

Other Information-

The Final product shall be made available to our funders not later than September 2014.It will be useable on ninjatrader trading platform and latter in the year  versions compatible with metatrader platform (mainly for forex trading) will also be made available. We are not making any promises regarding releasing versions compatible with tradestation, multichart or e-signals platform but we should have something for these platforms ready by early 2015.Our Funding supporters will have the version compatible with ninjatrader platform, except where they show preference for other platform. This Algorithm is very suitable for both day-trading and swing trading.

story:
The Low-Tech Solution for High Connectivity

DignifieDesigns simple, memory-stimulating puzzles combine the right skill with beautiful pictures from the past. They help families connect with loved ones and provide an activity those with Alzheimer's, recovering from stroke or traumatic brain injury can accomplish.

Please watch this short video and see folks using our puzzles for the first time.

Honoring My Mother & Helping Other Families

I cared for my mother for many years, both in my home and eventually in a care center where she died from Alzheimer's. Over the years it was frustrating and sad to find there weren't any activities she could do that were designed for an adult--most are made for young children.

Our puzzles look to change that for other families. The images from our puzzles spark memories and conversations and the large pieces are lightweight and easy to handle.

Made in the USA from post-consumer materials, the puzzles are even dishwasher safe for easy sanitation!

Get Us Out of the Driveway & On the Road!

Our company dreams of being a Garage Start-Up, but we're still in the driveway and need YOUR help! Reaching our goal will allow us to:

  • Attend the fall National Health Care Association trade show
  • Build our inventory to fullfill orders 
  • Prove our manufacturing can remain in the US, keeping American families working

What You Get

To express our gratitude for your help we offer:

  • Thank you's on our page, website and social media sites & the Top Ten Tips for Care Givers
  • Our Limited Edition Puzzle Piece key chain
  • Puzzles sent to you or donated in your name to the care center of your choice
  • Submit your personal family photo for consideration on a future puzzle

We fully expect to exceed our goal which will allow us to:

  • Attend conferences for family caregivers and state healthcare shows
  • Open a packaging plant, employing more people and get the puzzles off our dining table
  • Partner with a Dementia Care Training Specialist to improve quality of care

Should we miss our goal, we will build what inventory we can and continue to get the word out about our puzzles and the difference they can make.

You Can Be the Difference 

Nearly 6 million families are affected by Alzheimer's.Growing numbers of returning veterans suffer from traumatic brain injury and deserve sensory tools that are made for adults. A portion of our profits are donated to Alzheimer's research and to care facilities nationwide. YOU could be the difference for improving the quality of life for so many!

 

What Others Say About Us

Here are a few comments on our puzzles:

  • Dr. Ted Epperly, past President of the American Academy of Family Physicians: "This is a high quality activity that I recommend for any family with a loved one who suffers from any type of dementia or debilitating disease."
  • Judy C., a customer said, "With these puzzles I had the nicest visit with my mom that I can remember."
  • "These innovative puzzles have provided our Alzheimer's patients with many hours of enjoyment by reaching the long-term memories that remain intact through much of the continuum of their disease." Dr. F. John Geis, Medical Director, Oak Creek Care & Rehabilitation Centers

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you  just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Send our campaign to your friends, family and social networks-there are weekly prizes for the most referrals!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

THANK YOU!!
story_txt:
The Low-Tech Solution for High Connectivity
DignifieDesigns simple, memory-stimulating puzzles combine the right skill with beautiful pictures from the past. They help families connect with loved ones and provide an activity those with Alzheimer's, recovering from stroke or traumatic brain injury can accomplish.
Please watch this short video and see folks using our puzzles for the first time.
Honoring My Mother & Helping Other Families
I cared for my mother for many years, both in my home and eventually in a care center where she died from Alzheimer's. Over the years it was frustrating and sad to find there weren't any activities she could do that were designed for an adult--most are made for young children.
Our puzzles look to change that for other families. The images from our puzzles spark memories and conversations and the large pieces are lightweight and easy to handle.
Made in the USA from post-consumer materials, the puzzles are even dishwasher safe for easy sanitation!



Get Us Out of the Driveway & On the Road!
Our company dreams of being a Garage Start-Up, but we're still in the driveway and need YOUR help! Reaching our goal will allow us to:

Attend the fall National Health Care Association trade show
Build our inventory to fullfill orders 
Prove our manufacturing can remain in the US, keeping American families working


What You Get
To express our gratitude for your help we offer:

Thank you's on our page, website and social media sites & the Top Ten Tips for Care Givers
Our Limited Edition Puzzle Piece key chain
Puzzles sent to you or donated in your name to the care center of your choice
Submit your personal family photo for consideration on a future puzzle


We fully expect to exceed our goal which will allow us to:

Attend conferences for family caregivers and state healthcare shows
Open a packaging plant, employing more people and get the puzzles off our dining table
Partner with a Dementia Care Training Specialist to improve quality of care


Should we miss our goal, we will build what inventory we can and continue to get the word out about our puzzles and the difference they can make.


You Can Be the Difference 
Nearly 6 million families are affected by Alzheimer's.Growing numbers of returning veterans suffer from traumatic brain injury and deserve sensory tools that are made for adults. A portion of our profits are donated to Alzheimer's research and to care facilities nationwide. YOU could be the difference for improving the quality of life for so many!
 
What Others Say About Us
Here are a few comments on our puzzles:

Dr. Ted Epperly, past President of the American Academy of Family Physicians: "This is a high quality activity that I recommend for any family with a loved one who suffers from any type of dementia or debilitating disease."


Judy C., a customer said, "With these puzzles I had the nicest visit with my mom that I can remember."


"These innovative puzzles have provided our Alzheimer's patients with many hours of enjoyment by reaching the long-term memories that remain intact through much of the continuum of their disease." Dr. F. John Geis, Medical Director, Oak Creek Care & Rehabilitation Centers



Other Ways You Can Help
We understand if you  just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

Send our campaign to your friends, family and social networks-there are weekly prizes for the most referrals!
Use the Indiegogo share tools!


THANK YOU!!

story:
We are…

Boston and Chicago Rotaract Clubs working together for the first time on an International Service Project! We are very excited to be working in Guatemala, a country of indigenous people and where the Mayan Civilization was born!

We will be travelling to Guatemala on July 27th through August 5th and we hope to raise awareness and rally funds into our service project through this crowd-sourced funding campaign. We will be implementing the donations and sharing our experience with you during our trip! 

Working towards…

Building a sustainable and healthier future for Guatemala through donations that target under-and mal-nutrition in the country.

Did you know?

In the world…

  • 1 out of 6 people are undernourished
  • Every year 6 million children die from malnutrition before their 5th birthday.

In Guatemala…

  • More than 50 percent of the population have incomes below the extreme poverty line, which is defined as the amount needed to purchase a basic basket of food
  • The chronic undernutrition rate for children under 5 is 49.8 percent, the highest in the region and the fourth highest in the world.

 

With global and local organizations…

Our partner on the ground in Guatemala is the Rotary Club Guatemala Sur. Rotarians along with Rotaractors from Guatemala City will graciously host us in their homes and travel with Rotaract Chicago and Boston members to various project sites. We are grateful to have the support of these community leaders throughout the trip!

Mayan Families is a nonprofit operating in the Highlands of Guatemala, working to provide opportunities and assistance to the indigenous and impoverished people through education and community development programs.

Hospitalito Atitlán is a small private nonprofit hospital serving 75,000 Maya living on the southern shore of beautiful Lake Atitlán in the Guatemalan highlands. The hospital provides a full‐range of preventive and clinical health services with an emphasis on women and children and has the only 24/7 emergency and surgical obstetrical care within a two-hour radius.

Important Note: Boston and Chicago Rotaract Club members are travelling to Guatemala at their own expense. All funds and donations raised through this campaign will go towards the organizations we are working with in Guatemala. 

Kick-off & Celebrate with Rotaract 6/29 @ Glasscott's

Donate $10 (minimum on the campaign) and get an invitation to our Rotaract Party @ Glasscott's on June 29th.

Saturday, June 29th – Starts at 7:30 pm

Location: 2158 N Halsted @ the corner of Halsted and Webster

story:
UPDATE:

17.05.2013

Only 6 Days and no more help unfortunately. I Prays we can raise some more money this last days

 

(Some people say me there is no continue button after type the amount. please type first the amount and after this select no perk ,continue button comes after select perk or no perk.)

 

UPDATE 

20.04.2013

20 Days past , have total donate of 520 US Dollar from 6 people we will say you thank you su much and we hope we can rich our goal. 

 

Help rebuild our mosque

The Niksic mosque is the centerpiece of a thriving and well-rooted community in Niksic Montenegro. Serves both the local Muslim community as well as the community at large.

Unfortunately, in the end February a suspicious fire burned our mosque to the ground, and our community is left without a home during the most precious time of the year.  While heartbroken, we are buoyed by the support of people around the world, of all faiths, who have come to our side in our time of need. The 

 

NIKSIC MOSQUE BEFORE THE BURN:

The Mosque after the Fire :

The rebuilding begins now

We are hoping we can replace our house of worship as soon as possible, and build the foundation for a revitalized community that is determined to build a better life for ourselves and our neighbors.

What you can do

You can help us realize our dream of replacing our mosque and moving forward with our lives by doing the following for us:

  • Donate what you can - every little bit helps.  We welcome your charitable contributions for this year and pledge to put them to good use in rebuilding.
  • Share our IndieGoGo fundraising link with your social networks
  • Give us your prayers

 

An investment in the future

The best response to those who wish us ill is to draw from the best of our faith, and show the world that the power of good will forever outweigh those who wish to harm others.  Thank you for joining us in this effort!

 Only the Quran the fire have not Burn.. This is God's will


 

All donations go to the Islamic Society of Niksic

This is the only official mosque fundraising campaign for the Islamic Society of Niksic

 

if you have any gquestion please contact me medzlissanica@gmail.com

story:
Young Anthony better known as Anjo has Cerebral Palsy. The disability has not allowed him the enjoyment of walking or using some of his bodily functions as good as we would have liked. Anjo lives in Broome Western Australia which is surrounded with lovely beaches, Not all fully wheelchair accessed so we drive down and lift him in and out of the car manually, would love transport that's reliable that does this as he is not getting any lighter the older he gets :)

Anjo is a foster child who deserves to have as much fun in the sun like everyone else. He loves swimming and playing in the sand. Ten years old now and enjoying life as much as he can. School is his favourite daily activtity along with the local youth centre called DROP IN that allows Anthony to go and mingle with other kids and be involved.

Anjo's foster parents are modest people who get by everyday and want to offer him everything that he can get or be involved with. This includes taking him to the beach which he loves. Anjo loves swimming and wearing goggles he even can duck under water for while !! Pretty clever young lad !! 

We're not asking for much but the value of your support would be unmeasurable!! Big or little it will all help make life easier for Anjo and his carers.

Give a us a helping hand and help us get a vehicle that will make life a BEACH EVERYDAY :)

story:
OpenThink Lab on Prezi

We are a Non-Profit organization that advocates the responsible use of collective intelligence (CI) research. We need a way to talk as a species and makes sense of it all. There are so many great ideas that need to be heard. We are building a global information center and tool set dedicated to a better world through massive online collaboration, deliberation, project planning, research and the shared innovation.

We are diverse a group of individuals who have taken previous bodies of individual research and pooled them into one system; the tribeforth system. With diverse specializations from Military intelligence, Artificial intelligence, Political Science, Journalism and Marketing we have committed ourselves to developing the best system of conversation and argumentation modern technology can provide.  

FAQ

What is OpenThink Lab?

It is a first of its kind global crowdsourcing project. OpenThink Lab is designed to stimulate an international conversation about our society. The job of the Tribeforth Foundation is to provide and develop infrastructure for that conversation. We are creating a tool to facilitate understanding and collaborative problem solving

Doesn’t The Media Already Provide this Function?

Politifact has offered some transformative steps in real time fact checking. Our project goes beyond simply fact checking politicians but creates an environment in which entire arguments can be fact checked and developed. The debate held by the public, rather than exclusively by their officials.

What is Tribeforth's Involvement?

Our job is to ensure that the conversation continues and stays open source. We will be using social media analytics and as well as working with different media agencies in order to ensure that the conversation gets adequate coverage in new and conventional media. Our job is it ensure that social narrative and organization is maximized. We have an in house development team that will be creating tools to push the boundaries of our global conversation. Everything we build will be open source and GNU (Creative Commons, MIT) to support the development open source problem solving.

How does this change things?

It makes it about the idea and not just about the people telling the story. How is this different than Occupy: Online higher fidelity not about the occupation of space but the occupation of our own mind. It is about humanity living up to our potential. About thinking instead of being afraid. It is about reason being greater than distraction. It is about the peace that can only come through contemplation and self examination. Occupy was about breaking down a broken system, we're about building a better replacement. What do you believe: We all have our own opinions but we represent a process of solving problems not a standpoint on political issues. making informed decisions. Participatory government that is held accountable to its people through transparency. I believe in freedom, and responsibility. It is time for humanity to grow up and build our future together. Everyone needs to be a part of building our world. What are you trying to accomplish: We are trying to unite the best intentions of the world through technology. We are a technological call to action. We need a conversation about our conversation. More than anything we are here for intelligent, honorable, just and noble results. We are here to win. We are here to make humanity a force of nature/evolution. Long story short our goal is the creation of a global project management tool set that allows for collaborative open source engineering as well as social debate and information management.

How are you helping facilitate a more participatory government?

We want the public to be more involved, but today much of the public is apathetic or uninformed on many issues. We are creating tools that compile all of the information related to a contentious subject in a single place. During this ongoing process, of hosting debate, the means by which users will add content to their debate will inherently add structure to it. This structure can be represented visually, and each debate becomes a referenceable destination that can be used to facilitate the process of ‘doing your own research’ on a contentious subject. At the moment the debates are only between the figureheads and there are many relevant conversations that are not mentioned or discussed. In this way we’re moving the discussion into a more public domain. we’re building an interface that can support billions of people having a complex conversation about extremely complex issues at the same time. We want the discussion to be between the people the best represent the ideas that they’re talking about and that know the most about what’s related to what they’re talking about, not just the people with the most money.

What toys can be dreamed up to help reinforce discussion without dumbing it down?

It is all about linked data and linked discussions. We need to stop repeating the same argument a million times and just have a centralized location for that argument. Semantic annotation is an integral part of our systems design. Users can also propose merging of arguments and will have a full set of version control options. Much like github. We are doing several things to insure logical consistency of arguments. The first is the use of semantic annotation to classify the quality of the argument. Once classified as a logical fallacy users on the system will up/down vote on the classification. Once we have more free time to increase our research efforts we will include our natural language processing and pretty much break it down into propositional calculus. Long term we would like to have the option of switching between natural language and logical formula much like wordpress lets you switch between WYSIWYG and HTML editing. The biggest upgrade will be the interface. It will allow you to see all sides of a developing debate in real-time as well as supporting or opposing data (videos, articles, raw scientific data) connected to the discussion. I love the idea of an overview of supporting/opposing submissions to a debate.

How would you encourage/enforce submitters/contributors to meta-tag their contributions to enable these sortings of content for quantitative comparisons?

That is the idea behind collective semantic annotation of arguments. It is essentially establishing the formula of a debate to classify and monitor all its attributes. We would know where it is, what it is and what it is about and who is developing it. This would really clear up allot of what is going on around a given topic. The submission interface itself would be part of this process, since many people 'believe' the same things, or say things in a similar way, a system that 'reads' what people are saying and overlaps that submission to similar posts would be an automatic meta-tagging of sorts. We're also integrating the interface with information that we can pull from APIs from open data initiatives worldwide.

Do you want to ditch the upvote/downvote system?

Is there anything else that could highlight "better" branches of debate.” If you use up/downvote rating along with semantic annotation and classification of debates you will get progressively better data. The up/down dynamic is only poor when the platforms method for organizing and utilizing user submissions is flat. The real goal here is to map the arguments, capture the cited data in relation to them, and present a longer chain of assertions and debunkings than we presently ever hear about. But let me reiterate - we want to capture the argument itself. We want to store it and rank it. We want disputes to be highlighted, retained, and resolved not glossed over or unmentioned. We want transparency. We want to rank information, in multiple ways including a category for what scientific institutions think. We want to quantify a reputation ranking for those sources of information as artifacts are debunked over time. - We want to improve the amount and quality of information available for an informed electorate, to counteract the effects of monopolization in mainstream media.

Will accept anonymous submissions?

Yes

How do you intend to build in troll/shill-proofing?

By using semantics and applying analytics to user groups. When you can test the validity of information used to support positions and then use that as part of the rating. It becomes clear who is using bad intel and poor sources as that user reputation can be tied to the amount of valid sources he has attached to an argument point. Reputation is not flat. That data can be represented along the argument allowing a filter that demonstrates the more reliable opinions. A debate is not an island. It relies on other factors. When people start a debate they bring in information that has already been rated and vetted or they bring in new information that becomes vetted through the debate process. We also classify and organize the debates as a group and continue to keep them updated and relevant. This entire process rates the user and we get a much better picture of how reliable they are as users. This in turn helps us find reliable and important arguments. We are finding the "experts" and also analysing the form of a debate as a collective. We are planning to use a community vetting process, and yes there will be shills. So ban them from your community, or outvote them. It will be up to each community to weigh in on a given artifact that one of their debates references. If you don't like the job that your community is doing, leave it and find a smarter one. We will be associating and ranking all of the arguments from each community around a given artifact.

Who are we?

One year ago, Douglas McDowell and D'Arcy Cunningham founded a not for profit organization for the express purpose of creating OpenThinkLab. That NPO is called the Tribeforth Foundation. 

Douglas Mc Dowell - Executive Director - Educated in political science and trained in military intelligence with the Canadian Forces, Douglas' experience has allowed him to make invaluable contributions to the fundamental mechanics of the platform. Douglas has experience campaigning for political parties at a provincial and federal level, and has trained himself in software development through MIT's open courseware, creating a diverse skillset that provides him with an in depth understanding of all aspects of the project.

D'Arcy Cunningham - Senior Systems Architect - An award winning programmer with past experience in the space of government & board meeting automation. A certified specialist in SharePoint, he has an honours BSc in computer science, with concentrations in artificial intelligence and evolutionary algorithms, and has recently put a second degree in physics at UBC on hold for the express purpose of creating OpenThinkLab.

Tristan Haak - Creative Director - Tristan has years of experience managing public relations for online communities. Specializing in conflict resolution he has resolved countless problems for valued members of his community. An optimistic futurist, his unique ability to convey complex concepts, coupled with his grand scale vision of a greater, interconnected and compassionate humanity makes him the ideal advocate for OpenThinkLab.

We also classify and organize the debates as a group and continue to keep them updated and relevant. This entire process rates the user and we get a much better picture of how reliable they are as users. This in turn helps us find reliable and important arguments. We are finding the "experts" and also analysing the form of a debate as a collective. We are planning to use a community vetting process, and yes there will be shills. So ban them from your community, or outvote them. It will be up to each community to weigh in on a given artifact that one of their debates references. If you don't like the job that your community is doing, leave it and find a smarter one. We will be associating and ranking all of the arguments from each community around a given artifact.
Who are we?
One year ago, Douglas McDowell and D'Arcy Cunningham founded a not for profit organization for the express purpose of creating OpenThinkLab. That NPO is called the Tribeforth Foundation. 
Douglas Mc Dowell - Executive Director - Educated in political science and trained in military intelligence with the Canadian Forces, Douglas' experience has allowed him to make invaluable contributions to the fundamental mechanics of the platform. Douglas has experience campaigning for political parties at a provincial and federal level, and has trained himself in software development through MIT's open courseware, creating a diverse skillset that provides him with an in depth understanding of all aspects of the project.
D'Arcy Cunningham - Senior Systems Architect - An award winning programmer with past experience in the space of government & board meeting automation. A certified specialist in SharePoint, he has an honours BSc in computer science, with concentrations in artificial intelligence and evolutionary algorithms, and has recently put a second degree in physics at UBC on hold for the express purpose of creating OpenThinkLab.
Tristan Haak - Creative Director - Tristan has years of experience managing public relations for online communities. Specializing in conflict resolution he has resolved countless problems for valued members of his community. An optimistic futurist, his unique ability to convey complex concepts, coupled with his grand scale vision of a greater, interconnected and compassionate humanity makes him the ideal advocate for OpenThinkLab.

story:
Check out our NEW campaign to help furnish & equip Gongfu's new restaurant in Centretown! https://igg.me/at/gongfubao


 

 

*HEADS-UP!*
Below is our 2013 Gongfu bao cart campaign. While it is of historical/entertainment value, make sure to visit our NEW campaign here first!!!

##########################################################







 

 

"Gōngfu"?

gōngfu (功夫): accomplishment or skill cultivated through effort & hard work

After years of hard work under some of Ottawa's best chefs, Tarek Hassan is bringing his own gōngfu to Ottawa's exciting new street food scene!

 

bao?

Also known as 'steamed buns', bao are, essentially, large dumplings, made with yeast-raised dough, stuffed with savoury fillings, & steamed to pillowy perfection! We make our bao by hand & steam them fresh daily!

Bao have been around for millennia & are still rocking Asian night markets & food stalls to this day! One style of bao has been gaining popularity in North America in recent years, gua bao. We want to step it up & explore a variety of styles & regional variants!

"steamed bread + tasty meat = good eats!" Dave Chang (Momofuku, NYC). We couldn't agree more!

 

cart?

We'll be setting up at our amazing location at the west entrance to Confederation Park, on Elgin near Slater.

We're getting our cart from one of the top food cart manufacturers in North America, Apollo Carts! They're a Canadian company & build their carts customised to the vendor's needs.

 

 

Our Menu!...

We'll be offering 3 distinct styles of bao:

  • traditional filled bao
  • folded gua-bao
  • seared 'jian-bao

Every day we'll be offering a selection of three blow-your-mind fillings (one in each of the above styles) that will vary with the seasons. Here are some examples:

  • maple Berkshire char siu bao
  • 4-pepper short rib & onion bao
  • kaoye tofu & yam gua-bao
  • BLT (bacon, lettuce & toban-djan) gua-bao
  • duck confit & Shaoxing shallot 'jian-bao
  • "Shanghai grilled cheese" 'jian bao

Don't forget the sides! These again will vary with seasonal availability:

  • root veg chips
  • fresh slaws
  • seasonal salads
  • cup o' soup
  • house pickles & sauces

Gōngfu for ALL; vegetarian, vegan & gluten-free options will be available!

 

 

 

What are we all about?

Hardcore restaurant cookery meets street food accessibility! We want to bring food that is tasty, sustainably sourced, nutritious, fast, & affordable to Ottawa's streets!

Traditional food wisdom & skill meet modern food knowledge & technique! We want to be creative while still aknowledging & respecting the food traditions that brought us to where we are.

We are intimately involved with Ottawa's farming community! Our seasonally inspired & dynamic menu will celebrate the locally sourced & sustainably produced bounty that these amazing people make possible!

 

Gōngfu bao cart needs YOUR help!

We're ecstatic to have earned one of the coveted new street food vending permits from the city of Ottawa. Our innovative menu, featuring sustainable local produce, has earned us our favourite cart location: Confederation Park on Elgin!

This is where YOU come in! We need you to help us raise $15,000 to get our cart on the road for the beginning of the season. In return, you get delicious exclusive rewards!

We've designed our rewards so that you get excellent value for your investment in our project. At the end of the day, everybody wins!


We opted for the "flex" campaign, because we are committed to & capable of fulfilling our reward commitments, regardless of whether or not we reach our target.

If you're excited about our street food venture, please tell your friends! Your help promoting this campaign is just as valuable as your contributions.

 

See you all in May!!!

 

 

 

 

 

 * discount card fine-print:

  • valid for 1 year
  • available in May, regardless of perk selected
  • discounts are not cumulative
  • if extra discount cards are earned from multiple perks, they will be activated in following year(s)

 

** Dragon Master perk fine-print:

  • 1 bao & one side-dish every day that the cart is open
  • only the holder of the Dragon Master perk may use it
  • missed days do not accumulate

story:
Hello,

We are a brand new start up business looking to help the environment by keeping it clean of all the pet waste left behind by people who do not take the time to pick up after their pets while walking them.

Isn't it frustrating not being able to walk barefoot through the grass?

Isn't it gross having to smell all the waste left behind?

Is that something you want your children getting near and possibly getting sick from?

 

So, help us make a difference in the surrounding areas by allowing us to obtain the proper supplies and time to get this business off the ground and running. Helping us protect you, your family and pets, and the environment from all the nasty waste left behind!!!

Here are the Top 5 Reasons to pick up pet waste:

1: Dog poop is bad for the environment. The Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) has classified dog feces as a pollutant. When the pet waste is not cleaned up, rainfall may wash the feces into area waterways and contaminate our rivers and streams with disease-causing bacteria like fecal coli form, Salmonella, E. coli and Giardia.

2: In addition to environmental hazards, dog poop is toxic. Harmful bacteria found in dog poop can cause extreme illness in humans. Dog fecal matter contaminates the ground and becomes a method of passing intestinal parasites and harmful infections to dogs and to humans.

3: Pet waste can infest your dog with parasites if he steps in it. The cycle can continue as long as there are feces in the dog's environment. Picking up dog poop prevents a great deal of potential contamination and re-contamination. By picking up the poop, you could avoid costly veterinary expenses and even save money on human doctor bills. 

4: Many cities have ordinances and laws in place that require dog owners to clean up their pet's poop. If you are caught not cleaning up after your dog, you may be forced to pay a penalty.

5: Show consideration towards others. Carry bags when you walk your dog. Pick up the waste when it falls and dispose of it appropriately. Even if no one sees the dog doing his business. Clean it up for all the right reasons. Help protect the environment. Have pride in your community. Respect the earth.

 

We love our pets and also the environment.

If you are unable to donate, please help spread the word by any means possible to friends and family.

Get the word out!! Help keep our neighborhoods clean!!!

Thanks so much for your donations and time!

DONATE ANY AMOUNT YOU WISH! EVERY $1 HELPS!

(default is at $100, but you can put it at ANY amount)

 

T.P.P.

story:
Carnel Chamberlain is a four year old boy who was
reported missing on June 21, 2012
in Mount Pleasant, Michigan.
He is described as being 3 ft tall,
short dark hair & green eyes.
Please, call 911 or 989-775-4700
if you have any information
leading to him.
And... never lose HOPE!

story:
From the age of 16 right up until 30 I was a hopeless alcoholic and a drug addict.  My father died of alcoholism, and it was clear I was destined for the same fate. I couldn't hold a job, I was generally homeless.  I went to rehab five times and was in and out of AA for years, desperate to quit.  When it was clear that there was no escape, I tried to drink myself to death.  But thank God He had another plan for me! A young lady found me passed out on a street corner, took me in, nursed me back to health, and took me to her church.  I got saved, and I have been clean and sober for seven years now, by the grace of God! He gave me a brand new life and I thank Him for that every day! Now I'm married (five years!) and I've had the same job for seven years.  I'm a strong, active member of my church, and my community! I've written and self published two books, something I used to dream of, but never thought possible for myself.  

Two years ago I had a new dream, to grow my hair long.  That might not sound major, but I'd had short, thin, unhealthy hair all my life, and I was ready for a change! I tried everything on the market, nothing worked.  I asked God to help me, and I started doing research.  I developed a scalp oil that grew my hair from shoulder length to grazing my waist in a year and a half, which is fast by any standards, but definitely fast for a slow growing, ethnic head of hair.  Not only that, it grew thick and healthy! Soon friends and family started noticing the crazy growth I was getting and asked what I was doing. When I told them, they started asking me to make some for them, which I did.  Soon the demand was so high, I had to start charging just to buy the ingredients.  As demand grew, my husband suggested I start selling online, which I did.  I currently sell it on Amazon.com and on my own website. 

Recently my husband felt lead by the Lord to go into a beauty supply store and give the owner my card.  They began to talk, and the man said he wanted to meet me and discuss carrying my oil! We met and he is interested in carrying it in his MULTIPLE store locations! Woo hoo! Here's the only problem.  We cannot afford to manufacture the product to give him! I'm a waitress, and my husband recently got laid off.  The money we make from the oils covers the expense of making and shipping them right now, not much more.  The Lord has always made a way for us to survive, and continues to do so.  But we can't spare a dime for supplies.  We need ingredients, bottles, labels, etc.  

This is my dream, to help other women have the hair that they want! The Lord blessed me to discover an oil that truly works, and not just for me.  The first lady at my church was stricken with cancer.  She is in complete remission now, and has been for some time now, praise God! But she lost her hair to chemo and was forced to wear wigs. She is in her seventies (just turned 75) and had pretty much resigned herself to wigs from here on out.  But she heard about my oil and decided to try it.  Now, six months later, her hair is back longer and thicker than it was before.  No more wigs! I thank God that my oil can do this, and it has helped many others as well.   I call it Miracle Hair Growth Oil, because it has truly been a miracle.  

Now I'm asking YOU to be my miracle! Please help me to realize my dream of being a self-employed, hair product manufacturer! If you grab one of my exciting perks and donate to my Miracle Campaign, my husband and I will be able to place our oil in local beauty supply stores by spring! Being laid off has hit my husband especially hard and this will give him the employment and sense of purpose he seeks! We are partners in this, and this would be a dream come true for both of us! I would like to show young men and women who think that their life is hopeless, that their addictions, their demons, their obstacles will overwhelm them- I would like to show them that their life can turn around completely and that their dreams can come true! Please help me do that! 

The deadline on this campaign is short, because the beauty supply man wants to act fast on this.  If we can't get ready in time, he won't take us seriously.  Please help us! Any amount will help, any amount at all! If you absolutely cannot donate, we understand.  Trust me, with my husband unemployed and me pushing burgers for tips- we totally understand.  But please help us by telling friends, family and coworkers who might be in a better position to contribute.  

Please be a part of our dream.  Be a part of a successful business starting on the ground level.  Be our miracle! And God bless you!

Any amount will help, any amount at all! If you absolutely cannot donate, we understand.  Trust me, with my husband unemployed and me pushing burgers for tips- we totally understand.  But please help us by telling friends, family and coworkers who might be in a better position to contribute.  
Please be a part of our dream.  Be a part of a successful business starting on the ground level.  Be our miracle! And God bless you!

story:
Short Summary

Candace True here, owner/baker at Cupcakes By Candie. Right now, I'm baking things using a hand mixer and it gets pretty tough trying to bake over 50 cupcakes without a larger bowl and stand mixer. Because I'm just in my starting phases of this whole situation I don't have much money, but I have the love and support of my wonderful boyfriend and my friends and family. I would love to, eventually, break off and possibly get my own store front, but that will come in due time.

With recent loses of friends and family, I started to feel really stressed and just not happy with work or much else. I now have a job that I love, but when I get stressed, I bake....a LOT (the people at work LOVE IT). I feel that if baking were my full-time gig, I would be pretty stress free and would just be happiest doing what I LOVE to do. 

What We Need & What You Get

What I need: 

  1. Stand Mixer
  2. New Bowls
  3. Decorating Bags
  4. Cupcake Boxes
  5. Cupcake Wrappers

What you get:

 $5 Donations gets you 4 free cupcakes of your choosing (must be the same typer of cupcake per box of 4)

Every $10 Donation gets you a dozen free cupcakes of your choosing (must be the same type of cupcake for each dozen set)

 If I don't reach my goal, the funds will go towards the stand mixer and any other supplies that I need to survive in this business. 

The Impact

Any donation helps to contribute to keeping my new business up and running, and will help to eventually reaching the highest goal of owning my own business/store front. I love baking and I love seeing the looks on people's faces when they see the creations that together we made happen. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this page via social media through the share tools on IndieGoGo.

Share/Like the page for Cupcakes By Candie on facebook: http://www.facebook.com/CupcakesByCandie
