story:
SUN, FUN, OUTDOORS, FAMILY PICNICS, FRIENDS GETS-TOGETHERS … surely there is a whole lot of things you would prefer spending your time on during warm enjoyable summer… Why would you bother spending it on shops, when you can just jump online and shop for all family and all occasions in just 1 hour?

Winter... Why there is no proper summer clothes in the shops when we are just about to take a break from winter and head to warm countries?? Have you had those situations before? Well, we have… And we are about to change it! 

Our idea is to create an online summer shop offering only summer goods 365 days a year. Crazy? That may be.. but given that there is always summer somewhere in the world it’s not… The shop with a global presence will allow purchasing summer goods regardless of the season and customer’s location.

The e-shop is planned to be a "one stop" shop selling summer clothes, shoes, cosmetics, bijouterie, travel and home accessories for all family all year round.

   

The idea is a combination of the things we love and passionate about: summer, holidays, fashion and design. In fashion we love quality fabrics, great patterns, amazing colour combinations and use of art.

The initial launch of the shop is planned to take place in Russia with Russian language website on ‘.ru’ ecommerce platform. The headquarters as well as the warehouse will be located in Russia. Why Russia? Because it is our home market, which we understand better. It is also rapidly growing online fashion retail market with demanding customers constantly looking for the bright unique outfits and prepared to pay extra for the quality.

Although the initial launch is planned to be in Russia, the store will have global presence with English version, ‘.com’ domain name and logistics enabling shipping globally. 

 

Positive concept. It is all about things the majority of people like: sun, fun, joy, holiday.

Niche market. The niche for the shop will be unchanged season, not price. We are planning to target different customers offering summer goods within three main categories: basic, mid market and luxury. We are planning to raise awareness of the shop among our customers by positioning ourselves as the best place to go for summer fashion and other summer goods. This is particularly important in the colder seasons, when people tend to go for holidays to warm climate countries and keen to refresh their wardrobes.

Range of summer goods. It will not be limited to women’s and men’s fashion. We will be selling kids clothes and toys, sunscreen care, hair and skin summer care, travel and home accessories. The “one stop” shop concept will help customers to spend less time for searching required products before their holidays.

Global presence. Although the home and key market will be Russia we will sell globally. The global presence will be enabled through the English version of the website on ‘.com’ ecommerce platform and logistics enabling shipping globally.

Range of brands and designers. While travelling we are constantly discovering new brands and designers who offer some really great outfits. We are keen to introduce them into our shop. We will also source some basic things like t-shirts, shirts, thongs, etc. from Chinese and Indonesian producers to satisfy different customer’s preferences. The range of brands and number of stock items directly depend on the available financing.

The price and quality of the goods. We just admire quality and good-looking things! We believe that classy look can be created with inexpensive items - it is just a matter of the right choice of items and accents. This is exactly what we are trying to achieve in the store: to offer clothes across three main price categories (cheap, middle range and expensive) with the main condition - it should look great and be of a great quality.

Support young/unknown artists and designers. We are keen to have unique products in the shop. We do appreciate art and design. We are eager to give opportunity to young and/or unknown artists and designers to create outfits, cool prints or patterns for clothes and to make accessories.

 Elena - the initiator, the entrepreneur-to-be, the girl for whom corporate career is just not enough.

I have successful corporate career - during last 9 years I was working for a global consultancy firm growing internally from an entry level to managerial positions. My specialisation is financial due diligence (financial analysis in simple words) of the companies due for sale or purchase. My experience covers quite broad range of industries, geographies and corporate cultures. I do have experience in retail industry too. During my career I performed analysis of financial and operational performance of Russian and Australian retail companies. The recent projects were in Australia: due diligence of the leading retailer of sport goods in Australia and the iconic Australian surfing company. I do understand the retail business drivers and major challenges.

I always felt that I want to work for myself.. think now I have enough experience and courage to try. I am very keen to start my own journey in the world called ‘business’.

 Elena (different one:)) - fashionista, the girl with impeccable taste and experience in marketing and exhibitions organisation. Elena has solid experience in organising and managing exhibitions of different kind. Elena is very good at acquiring useful contacts and building relationships. She is also very good in styling her looks … funny how sometimes people think she wears luxury brands when she just mixed up some mass market brand items.. By the way Elena is the girl on the main image photo of this campaign:)

Me and Elena have the whole range of cloths - from cheap t-shirts to high fashion brands and have experience in creating great looks for any budget. Even though we are aware of the fashion’s latest trends, we believe that fashionable look doesn’t necessarily need to belong to any particular designer. The most important is to find right colour combination, right shape and to feel confident in what you wear. Well… and maybe to add a couple of accents to make the look standout. We can help people with any budget to look great. Think this is the most important skill that we are going to bring to the shop. 

To get an idea of our taste and type of things we will most likely be sourcing to the shop, please have a look at out Pinterest boards.

Nicole – mentor and advisor. Nicole is very energetic and inspiring entrepreneur. She is co-founder of Drink Digital and Balmain Boat Company and a founder of VIAJIYU (shoes made to order). She has more than 15 years experience in digital media and her company, Drink Digital, was a digital strategy advisor for such companies as J&J, Ebay and Nestle in Australia.

 

We need a quite significant initial investment to buy stock and to finance our marketing plan.

We are planning to start with about 1000 items across all categories. The range and designer vs regular brands mix are dependent on the financing available. The requested target amount of the campaign reflects our estimation of approximately 500 to 1000 items stock level across all categories. As we are trying to make a quality product and create a positive image, we cannot compromise on the quality of goods in the shop and quality of logistics. It means we might be required to buy more expensive stock from reputable suppliers and invest more in reliable logistic chains.

We have created a number of perks to stimulate investing in our project. Contributions of $25 -$1,000 will be rewarded with the discount of 3% to 20% for any purchase in the shop. Contributions of $500 and $1,000 will also be rewarded by gift vouchers of $300 and $600 nominal value (yes, you will get discounts first and then will be able to buy it with the voucher).

As stated in our smaller perks – contributions less than 25$ are also very much appreciated. We are big believers in “giving” concept and that small things help to build the bigger ones.

 

Please share contacts with us and spread the word about us. If you know young/unknown designers and artists who create fantastic clothes, accessories and bijouterie do not hesitate to connect us!

Of course, spread the word about us! Please share this project everywhere you can!

Please fill free to follow us on Facebook (in English), Facebook (in Russian), Google + (in English), Google + (in Russian), Pinterest, Twitter, Instagram.

 

If you have any questions, business offers or would like to connect, please do not hesitate to contact me, Elena Litau, via e-mail: e.litau@shop-summer.com
story_txt:
SUN, FUN, OUTDOORS, FAMILY PICNICS, FRIENDS GETS-TOGETHERS … surely there is a whole lot of things you would prefer spending your time on during warm enjoyable summer… Why would you bother spending it on shops, when you can just jump online and shop for all family and all occasions in just 1 hour?
Winter... Why there is no proper summer clothes in the shops when we are just about to take a break from winter and head to warm countries?? Have you had those situations before? Well, we have… And we are about to change it! 
Our idea is to create an online summer shop offering only summer goods 365 days a year. Crazy? That may be.. but given that there is always summer somewhere in the world it’s not… The shop with a global presence will allow purchasing summer goods regardless of the season and customer’s location.
The e-shop is planned to be a "one stop" shop selling summer clothes, shoes, cosmetics, bijouterie, travel and home accessories for all family all year round.
   
The idea is a combination of the things we love and passionate about: summer, holidays, fashion and design. In fashion we love quality fabrics, great patterns, amazing colour combinations and use of art.
The initial launch of the shop is planned to take place in Russia with Russian language website on ‘.ru’ ecommerce platform. The headquarters as well as the warehouse will be located in Russia. Why Russia? Because it is our home market, which we understand better. It is also rapidly growing online fashion retail market with demanding customers constantly looking for the bright unique outfits and prepared to pay extra for the quality.
Although the initial launch is planned to be in Russia, the store will have global presence with English version, ‘.com’ domain name and logistics enabling shipping globally. 
 
Positive concept. It is all about things the majority of people like: sun, fun, joy, holiday.
Niche market. The niche for the shop will be unchanged season, not price. We are planning to target different customers offering summer goods within three main categories: basic, mid market and luxury. We are planning to raise awareness of the shop among our customers by positioning ourselves as the best place to go for summer fashion and other summer goods. This is particularly important in the colder seasons, when people tend to go for holidays to warm climate countries and keen to refresh their wardrobes.
Range of summer goods. It will not be limited to women’s and men’s fashion. We will be selling kids clothes and toys, sunscreen care, hair and skin summer care, travel and home accessories. The “one stop” shop concept will help customers to spend less time for searching required products before their holidays.
Global presence. Although the home and key market will be Russia we will sell globally. The global presence will be enabled through the English version of the website on ‘.com’ ecommerce platform and logistics enabling shipping globally.

Range of brands and designers. While travelling we are constantly discovering new brands and designers who offer some really great outfits. We are keen to introduce them into our shop. We will also source some basic things like t-shirts, shirts, thongs, etc. from Chinese and Indonesian producers to satisfy different customer’s preferences. The range of brands and number of stock items directly depend on the available financing.
The price and quality of the goods. We just admire quality and good-looking things! We believe that classy look can be created with inexpensive items - it is just a matter of the right choice of items and accents. This is exactly what we are trying to achieve in the store: to offer clothes across three main price categories (cheap, middle range and expensive) with the main condition - it should look great and be of a great quality.
Support young/unknown artists and designers. We are keen to have unique products in the shop. We do appreciate art and design. We are eager to give opportunity to young and/or unknown artists and designers to create outfits, cool prints or patterns for clothes and to make accessories.

 Elena - the initiator, the entrepreneur-to-be, the girl for whom corporate career is just not enough.
I have successful corporate career - during last 9 years I was working for a global consultancy firm growing internally from an entry level to managerial positions. My specialisation is financial due diligence (financial analysis in simple words) of the companies due for sale or purchase. My experience covers quite broad range of industries, geographies and corporate cultures. I do have experience in retail industry too. During my career I performed analysis of financial and operational performance of Russian and Australian retail companies. The recent projects were in Australia: due diligence of the leading retailer of sport goods in Australia and the iconic Australian surfing company. I do understand the retail business drivers and major challenges.
I always felt that I want to work for myself.. think now I have enough experience and courage to try. I am very keen to start my own journey in the world called ‘business’.
 Elena (different one:)) - fashionista, the girl with impeccable taste and experience in marketing and exhibitions organisation. Elena has solid experience in organising and managing exhibitions of different kind. Elena is very good at acquiring useful contacts and building relationships. She is also very good in styling her looks … funny how sometimes people think she wears luxury brands when she just mixed up some mass market brand items.. By the way Elena is the girl on the main image photo of this campaign:)
Me and Elena have the whole range of cloths - from cheap t-shirts to high fashion brands and have experience in creating great looks for any budget. Even though we are aware of the fashion’s latest trends, we believe that fashionable look doesn’t necessarily need to belong to any particular designer. The most important is to find right colour combination, right shape and to feel confident in what you wear. Well… and maybe to add a couple of accents to make the look standout. We can help people with any budget to look great. Think this is the most important skill that we are going to bring to the shop. 
To get an idea of our taste and type of things we will most likely be sourcing to the shop, please have a look at out Pinterest boards.
Nicole – mentor and advisor. Nicole is very energetic and inspiring entrepreneur. She is co-founder of Drink Digital and Balmain Boat Company and a founder of VIAJIYU (shoes made to order). She has more than 15 years experience in digital media and her company, Drink Digital, was a digital strategy advisor for such companies as J&J, Ebay and Nestle in Australia.
 
We need a quite significant initial investment to buy stock and to finance our marketing plan.
We are planning to start with about 1000 items across all categories. The range and designer vs regular brands mix are dependent on the financing available. The requested target amount of the campaign reflects our estimation of approximately 500 to 1000 items stock level across all categories. As we are trying to make a quality product and create a positive image, we cannot compromise on the quality of goods in the shop and quality of logistics. It means we might be required to buy more expensive stock from reputable suppliers and invest more in reliable logistic chains.
We have created a number of perks to stimulate investing in our project. Contributions of $25 -$1,000 will be rewarded with the discount of 3% to 20% for any purchase in the shop. Contributions of $500 and $1,000 will also be rewarded by gift vouchers of $300 and $600 nominal value (yes, you will get discounts first and then will be able to buy it with the voucher).
As stated in our smaller perks – contributions less than 25$ are also very much appreciated. We are big believers in “giving” concept and that small things help to build the bigger ones.
 
Please share contacts with us and spread the word about us. If you know young/unknown designers and artists who create fantastic clothes, accessories and bijouterie do not hesitate to connect us!
Of course, spread the word about us! Please share this project everywhere you can!
Please fill free to follow us on Facebook (in English), Facebook (in Russian), Google + (in English), Google + (in Russian), Pinterest, Twitter, Instagram.
 
If you have any questions, business offers or would like to connect, please do not hesitate to contact me, Elena Litau, via e-mail: e.litau@shop-summer.com

story:
Bid to Escape

There are many penny auction sites for electrical goods; but if its a beach and not an iPod you are lusting after, then for most, months of saving is the only way to get there.

We are two working mothers who love to get away, whether it be a weekend locally, or an international adventure. But with two kids and a husband in tow who can afford it?

Our imagination was captured by the penny auction concept, and the fun you can have whilst trying to win your hearts desire. But whenever there was a flight it was just for one, and though sometimes it might be tempting to leave the kids behind we wanted to make a better site that would give families and couples the chance to bid on a dream escape.

What we will do with the funding:

We've chosen the software and a hosting provider, stability,functionality and the ability to cope with large traffic loads are key to the success of a site like this and we've chosen providers with a proven track record.

Penny auction software - $4000

Website build and Hosting - $4000

Website promotion - $8000

Funding for the first few trips whilst awareness is building $4000

We will also be using our own funds, and if we don't reach our goal we will still be going ahead....just a lot slower !!

Perks

Contributors will be rewarded with bids to use when the website goes live - so your support could see you on a flight to Europe, lazing on a beach in Bali or grape grazing in the Yarra Valley.

Larger donations could also be sporting a Bid to Escape Beach towel, t-shirt or sunscreen.

What your contribution will do

Reaching our goal will let us launch the website as soon as possible. we want to offer family holidays as well as return flights for two.

We will start with Australia but hope to expand into the UK and US.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute please spead the word about Bid to Escape and don't forget to follow us on Twitter,  like us on Facebook and use the Indiegogo share tools to get your friends involved.

story:
* All the pictures and videos used in the video above were taken by me on my trip to India.

Update 2: *** 2/25/14 Thank you to everyone who helped make this campaign a success! With your help, three houses will be constructed, for a total estimated cost of $25,000! The houses will include one room, one kitchen, and one toilet. Two houses are to be completed by March 2014. The construction of the third one will begin when the family submits their land documents. Check out the Gallery tab for pictures of the houses! Many thanks to the Kriya Yoga Institute for making this  happen.

Update 1: ***9/8/13 Great News, we had an unexpected last minute change. The end date of our campaign is now extended until October 20th.This is a rare opportunity. Let's try to reach our goal!!!!


How it all started:

This summer, my family and I packed our bags and traveled across the world to Uttarkashi, Uttarakhand, India. We were actually one of the 40 other people from around the globe, attending a 2 week retreat held by Kriya Yoga Institute, in their ashram in the Himalayas. 

 From the minute we arrived, there was a constant downfall of rain. Two days into our trip, the Ganga's water level rose drastically; the river was becoming more and more powerful. The situation became so severe, that the bridge we crossed to get to the ashram was wiped away! We were stuck.  Finally, nine days later some villagers helped our group (40 outsiders) cross a deadly trail to reach a location where we were rescued by an Indian army helicopter.

If it weren't for these villagers we wouldn't have been able to get out. I'm forever grateful for them. They put their own lives at risk to help us, whom they've never met, and they weren't even asking anything in return. I'm also grateful for the Indian army. They sent helicopters to rescue us and many other villagers.

For more on the story visit: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-india-23095732

For an informational video: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-india-23310447

 The devastation of the flooding:

What my group went through was close to nothing compared to the villagers scattered throughout the Himalayas.

It is reported that thousands are dead, and over 5,000 people are missing (BBC News). Many have lost their homes and loved ones. 

This was the worst flash flood in 80 years. The river took everything in its path. Houses, land, and people were all washed away by the power of the Ganga.

What the Villagers need:

They need as much as they can get! Imagine LOSING EVERYTHING, well that's their reality. Paramahamsa Prajnanananda once said, "…adopt the attitude that everyone in this world belongs to one family..." So, let's help our family!!

With your help and contributions, we will revive these villagers’ lives by building new homes and providing food and supplies.  Here are the estimated costs:

  • $8,500 to build one house
  • $20 to feed one person for 10 days

The goal is to build about 10 houses and provide food for the villagers. That's why I set my goal of raising $108,000. I hope that each one of you will make this your personal goal as well and help me as much as you can. 

Reassurance:

I'm not the only one behind this project. A special thank you goes to my mom, who suggested the fundraising idea and supervises the project and to Kriya Yoga Institute for referring me to the Indiegogo website.

IMPORTANT: All funds raised will be deposited directly on the Kriya Yoga Institute bank account through this Indiegogo website.  The Kriya Yoga Institute is a nonprofit institution registered as 501(c)(3) in the United States. All donations are tax deductible.

A list of the names of people who donated and the amount will also be sent to Kriya Yoga Institute.  

The Kriya Yoga Institute will plan and supervise the construction of the houses of the Uttarkashi people, through its affiliated institution, Prajanana Mission.

If you would like more info on the organization feel free to visit their website: http://www.kriya.org/  and http://www.prajnanamission.org/

Other ways you can help:

For those of you who do not have the means to donate, you can still help! 

  • SPREAD THE WORD!!!!  By Facebook, email, twitter, etc…
  • Personally tell your friends, family, and colleagues about this campaign.
  • Use the share tools at the top of the page.
  • Like us on Facebook at Uttarkashi Relief Fund

If we don't meet our goal (I have faith that we will) all the funds raised will still be sent to the Uttarkashi people.

I thank everyone in advance that has helped me thus far and will in the future. Thank you for donating and spreading the word!!!!

Contact:

If you have any questions contact me at:  urfund2013@gmail.com

Paula

story:
Friends,

Kyle and I developed ShareThanksgivingDinner.org a few days before (Canadian) thanksgiving. In less than a week, it took off, generating almost 100 signups and matching 30 new and established families. 

CBC, CTV, The Huffington Post, Talk1010 and other media outlets were excited about the idea and covered it.

We had a great reaction among matched families and want to take this larger. We're starting with a campaign to extend across Toronto in November, and then looking at other Canadian cities for the holidays.

This is a really simple idea, but we need some funds. The first steps were funded by Parker's and Kyle's credit cards, and since neither of us are employed, we need a bit of capital. 

The funds will cover things like hosting, printing materials, some facebook ads, some programer support any personal expenses.

We hope you can help us take this great idea and grow it into something even larger as we explore this second phase!

Thanks,

Parker and Kyle

story:
The SOS Story

S.O.S. (Support Our Soldiers) was founded in 2007 after our son-in-law
was deployed to Iraq.   We learned that the soldiers serving were in
need of many basic necessities, so we felt we had to do something. 
The first year, we held a very successful motorcycle run and raised money
for care packages and sent over many, many items to our soldiers.   

We then learned that there were so many others doing exactly the same thing, so
we asked our son-in-law what is it that you guys (and gals) need (or want) the most?   Hetold us that the MWR (Morale, Welfare and Recreation) needed funds more than anyone.   What is that you ask?  Well, we asked the same thing,
which is why they needed help…no one seemed to know what they are.  
The soldiers do though.  The MWR is a network of support and leisure
services designed for use by U.S. soldiers (active, Reserve, and Guard), their
families, civilian employees, military retirees and other eligible
participants. The MWR is the only organization within the military that supplies
them with the day-to-day “distractions” of the mundane, and sometimes
terrifying life they live.   They supply everything right down to the
Frisbees and footballs that they use to blow off steam.  So, in year two,
we held another motorcycle run and all our fundraising efforts were directed to
the MWR.

We are completely a volunteer organization, and depend on our members to help us in the Mission.  

Since most of us ride, we are also a Riding Club, but having and/or riding a motorcycle is NOT a requirement to join us!   These activities are secondary to our Mission, but we enjoy the camaraderie and Brother/Sisterhood all the same.

Our membership is open to all!  Men, women, Veteran, non-Veteran, biker, non-biker, even children in our Junior Division.   The only “requirement” of membership is the belief in our Mission and the desire to make a change.

We are located in Massachusetts, so we will be helping Veterans in this state, and all states in New England.   We are also committed to raising awareness for the POW/MIA issue.    

Support Our Soldiers, Inc., was incorporated as a 501(c)(3) in 2013.

I hope this brief history has answered any questions you may have, but if you would like to speak with one of us directly, or join us in our cause, please feel free to email our President, Greg, at:  sosincpresident@aol.com or generally at sosrun@aol.com.   

Thank you!  

 

What We Need

So...what is it we need and what is this campaign all about? 

I’m asking if you’d help us defray some of the costs to get all the necessary paperwork in with the IRS to complete our non-profit status and other start-up necessities.   I’m really not sure what part of ‘non-profit’ these folks don’t get, but these start-up costs are daunting.  I would SO much rather be spending our funds on helping our Veterans!!!  Any and all help is VERY much appreciated!!!  To those of you who already have…THANK YOU!!!!

The Impact

The impact is not for us.  It's for our Veterans!  Each and every penny we raise goes directly to helping our Veterans, whether they are active duty, retired, Reserve, or their families.   Our Mission Statement is simple:   To assist Veterans of the United States Armed Forces in any way possible, and to raise awareness of the POW/MIA issue. 

That's it!   Help us help our Veterans, because freedom has NEVER been free!

Other Ways You Can Help

You can join us in our Mission!!!!   Please contact our President, Greg, at:  sosincpresident@aol.com for details!   We meet regularly the first Monday of each month.   Please join us!

story:
Life with ALS

My dad was diagnosed with Lou Gehrig's disease. It is a neurological disease which has no cure. It slowly paralyzes a person until they can no longer move, including eating and lastly breathing. It leaves your mind and senses untouched during the entire process. I am going to be my dad's care taker when he can no longer do things himself. 

  • My dad is 59 years old. Other than his family, his only love is his pug named Minnie. She loves him literally more than anything else.
  • I have no idea how I am going to keep my dad's mind off of dying other than to help him LIVE a fuller life while he can.

What We Need


  • We need help with paying for Plane tickets, hotel, and disneyland tickets.
  • Any of the money will go STRAIGHT to paying for these things. Nothing else.

The Impact

You know how a trip like this will impact a dying person's life. If you have any money to spare and would like to help brighten someone's life when they really need it, please do! I promise to help others in the future. What goes around comes around...and I like to spread hope.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    • Please share this with anyone you think would be fulfilled by helping.


    I can't thank anyone enough for helping with this. I know I am not alone and I have faith people want to share in my experience.

We need help with paying for Plane tickets, hotel, and disneyland tickets.
 Any of the money will go STRAIGHT to paying for these things. Nothing else.
   The ImpactYou know how a trip like this will impact a dying person's life. If you have any money to spare and would like to help brighten someone's life when they really need it, please do! I promise to help others in the future. What goes around comes around...and I like to spread hope.      Other Ways You Can Help Please share this with anyone you think would be fulfilled by helping.I can't thank anyone enough for helping with this. I know I am not alone and I have faith people want to share in my experience.

story:
Short Summary

We need your help!

Would it help if you knew how your prospects were searching online?  What if you could find out not only what and how people are searching, but what Google is suggesting to them as they search? Well we hope to help you!


We have developed a way to connect with Google's Search Algorithm to find out what Google is actually suggesting to people as they search.  This gives you the "Secret Edge" on your competitors! 

All we need is your help to develop this into a package that everyone can use!

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help to raise the $20,000 needed to develop this tool into a simple Web based platform that everyone can use. As we raise funds beyond that level, we will continue to add additional features and enhancements to provide even more detailed information to help you increase traffic in your marketing.

Check out the list of perks. There are several levels for that you can jump into, and each level comes with great perks!

Don't forget to help us by spreading the word! The more people that find out about this tool, the more powerful we can create it for you! Plus, Special Surprise Perks for the Top Individuals who help spread the word, use the Indiegogo Share Tools, so we know who you are.

The Impact

I have used this tool to find so many HIGH TRAFFIC words that it is hard to believe! One client wanted us to set-up a Google Adwords campaign for them. We had Google build out the campaign and suggest the keywords, and then we added in some keyword phrases that we found with this software.  One of the secret keyword phrases, generated by our software, was responsible for over half of the search traffic!  For my own company, ONE SECRET Keyword phrase generated almost $100,000 in sales last month alone!


Now you might be thinking, how is this different from all of the other keyword research tools out there?  Good question!  This is different in two ways:


First, this software is based on actual search suggestions from Google.  Most tools either make you think up your own keywords or try to copy them from your competitors. What makes you think that your competitors have the premium keywords?  They started out just guessing on what people might search!


Second, this software is designed for real people. Most keyword tools require technical knowledge, and if you don't already know what you are doing they don't help much.  We want to provide a simple, easy way for you to increase your online traffic, without knowing all those SEO secrets you keep hearing about.  And, if you do know some secrets, then this will work even better!


We have the software to generate thousands of keyword phrases from a single keyword based on Google's own algorithm.  We want to make this valuable software available to every small business owner trying to generate online traffic.  In order to develop the web-based software for subscription use, we need to raise $20,000 to develop this in a way that it will work for you each and every time.


Once launched, level one will provide single use memberships for $50 or monthly memberships for $79 per month.  If we exceed our goal, we will continue development to add additional features like:

  • Show the number of times that your keywords are searched each month.

  • Show how many other people are competing for the same keywords or phrase.

  • Integration with Google Adwords.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help spread the word! You can share this page on your social media, and use the Indiegogo share tools.

For the top sharers, we will include additional perks! Best of all, once we reach our goal, the person who helps raise the highest amount in contributions will win a Top of the Line Name Brand 7" Tablet (details to follow).

story:
Who Are We? And What Are We Up To?

We’re Shawn and Aaron Grose, two “alternatively thinking” brothers who’ve been passionately brewing for over 10 years.  We love beer, bikes, and sustainable technology. We’ve been involved in the Michigan craft beer movement since 1995 and would love to pour our passion into making a difference by bringing our unique brewery to the city of Detroit. 

Windmill Pointe Brewing is our collective vision that intertwines bikes, people, energy and beer into a “one-of-a-kind” sustainable brewery. The Brewery retrieves its main source of energy from our patent-pending system that utilizes bicycles supported by wind and solar technologies.  With our “Pedal-Powered Beer™” energy monitoring program and sustainable philosophy, we will create a positive impact in our community by producing a more environmentally friendly beer.

We see Pedal-Powered Beer™ as a community-driven effort to create unique beer styles while building a relationship between our patrons and the brewery. When fulfilled, this dream will make us the country’s very first pedal-powered brewery. 

What Makes Us Different?

We generate our own electricity via “Pedal-Power” – the cornerstone of our electric brew house. Our stationary bikes produce pedal-power which is collected, stored, and recorded. The number of kilowatts we produce from in-house “Pedal-Power” is subtracted from the total number of kilowatts used in each brew session. The goal is to produce more energy through pedal-power and sustainable technologies than consumed by the production of our beer. 

Our community members are invited to power our beer in the form of a challenging stationary bike race - The Tour de Beer!:

  • Patrons pedal our bikes
  • Our pedal-powered beer program tracks the time, distance, and how many beers they’ve actually powered
  • Patrons advance through the multi-stage race and are rewarded with credits
  • Patrons can redeem credits in our tasting room and store
  • Completing the final stage wins the Tour de Beer and the gold jersey
  • Winners get a party and name graced on the Kilowatt Cup

Making A Difference Differently

Beside the health benefits of riding bikes in our brewery, we’ll collaborate with organizations that also make a difference in Metro Detroit. We’ve entered into a relationship with the world-renowned Pewabic Pottery to brew a beer that supports their educational foundation. And we’re continually thinking about, seeking and nurturing other ways we can give support.

Why Are We Asking For Funding?

Here’s the reality for us ~ we need funding to bring Windmill Pointe Brewing Company to the next level. And we know exactly what we need to do.  It’s that simple.  Here’s how your monetary support will be used:

If we don’t reach our goal, whatever funds were raised will complete the development of the Pedal-Powered Beer™ program.   

Our “Triple Bottom Line” Goal

We’ll be measuring our success on a “Triple Bottom Line” approach.  Three principles will guide us in making Windmill Pointe Brewing Company a truly sustainable business:

  •  People: Diversity, Well-being, Fairness
  •  Profits: Customers, Competitors, Economy
  •  Planet: Climate, Air, Water, Soil

Through these principles we will build our business to make us feel a little better and smile a little longer.  And drink better beer!

No Money? You Can Still Help!

If you can't contribute, that’s ok by us. We still want you to be part of our success. Spread the word of our sustainable brewing adventure and use the Indiegogo share tools and your social media channels (Twitter, FaceBook, GooglePlus) to direct people of interest to our Indiegogo webpage.  We’d appreciate any non-funding ways you can help.

Thank You and Cheers to a sustainable future! 

Shawn & Aaron Grose
